Albany.Patroon Agent's House and Office: Patroon Agent's House and Office, also known as the Casparus Pruyn House and Office or Whish-Hull House and H. V. Rector office, is a historic home and office located on the Hudson River at Rensselaer in Rensselaer County, New York. It was built and first occupied Nov. 29, 1839 and consists of a ​2 1⁄2-story rectangular brick residence with an attached 1-story rectangular brick office in the Greek Revival style.
